text: Zagibovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Polozovoskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 4 as of 2010.ВПН-2010. Численность и размещение населения Пермского края There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located on the Zagibovka River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Zagibovka
